modernwarpmenu.config.categories.general: Settings that customize the functionality of the modern warp menu
modernwarpmenu.config.categories.debug.t: Settings for features used by pack developers to create custom textures and layouts for the modern warp menu
modernwarpmenu.config.categories.support: Click to join the Modern Warp Menu Discord server
modernwarpmenu.config.categories.updateA: There is a new version of Modern Warp Menu available. Click for more details.
modernwarpmenu.config.title: Modern Warp Menu Settings
modernwarpmenu.config.subtitle: Categories
modernwarpmenu.config.general.warpMenuEn: Replace the default warp menu with the modern warp menu
modernwarpmenu.config.general.showIsland: Show each island's name below its picture
modernwarpmenu.config.general.hideWarpLa: Hide Warp Labels Until Island Hovered
Hide the island's warp button labels until the mouse is hovering over the island
Hide Warp Label for One Warp Islands
Hide warp label for islands with only one warp
modernwarpmenu.config.general.suggestWar: Reminders to Use Modern Warp Menu
Show reminders to use the modern warp menu when the player uses a warp command
modernwarpmenu.config.general.addWarpCom: Add Warp Command to Chat History
Add warp commands sent by the modern warp menu to your chat history
modernwarpmenu.config.general.showJerryI: Show the Jerry's Workshop island on the modern warp menu
modernwarpmenu.config.general.hideUnobta: Hide warps only obtainable during special game modes such as Bingo
modernwarpmenu.config.general.enableUpda: Show a notification on the settings button and in the settings menu when a new version of Fancy Warp Menu is available
modernwarpmenu.config.general.showRegula: Show the button to access the regular warp menu
modernwarpmenu.config.debug.showDebugOve: Show an overlay with coordinate values and button borders over the modern warp menu. Press TAB while the warp menu is open to toggle.
Show borders around island and warp buttons. Press B while the modern warp menu is open to toggle.
modernwarpmenu.config.debug.skipSkyBlock: Skip checking for whether the player is on SkyBlock
modernwarpmenu.config.debug.alwaysShowJe: Always show Jerry's Workshop on the warp menu regardless of the value of the general > showJerryIsland setting and the in-game season
modernwarpmenu.messages.useWarpMenuInste: Reminder to use the Modern Warp Menu instead!
modernwarpmenu.errors.slotHasNoItem: Slot %d Has No Item to Click On
modernwarpmenu.errors.mouseIsHoldingItem: Mouse is Already Holding an Item
modernwarpmenu.errors.modernWarpGui.ches: Chest inventory size (%d) is smaller than expected (%d), falling back to vanilla chest UI
modernwarpmenu.errors.modernWarpGui.item: Chest item match check failed, falling back to vanilla chest UI
